name: The Water Cream Oil-Free Pore Minimizing Refillable Moisturizer
about: What it is:¬†A refillable, lightweight, oil-free gel cream that delivers 3x hydration* while visibly refining pores & smoothing texture with a BHA alternative...Skin Type:¬†Normal, Oily, and Combination..Skincare Concerns:¬†Dryness, Pores, and Dullness..Formulation:¬†Lightweight Gel..Highlighted Ingredients:.-Japanese Wild Rose: Visibly tightens pores and smooths skin texture.-Hadasei 3: Smooths, plumps, and provides antioxidant protection..Ingredient Callouts: This product is cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know:.The Water Cream provides nutrient-rich, balanced hydration with the unique water-burst texture that breaks upon application to deliver nourishment while feeling lightweight and smooth. It clarifies and refines skin with pure, powerful Japanese botanicals and our proprietary Hadasei-3, a ferment of Japanese superfoods that plumps skin, protects it from skin-aging stressors, and replenishes the moisture barrier...Research Results:¬†In a 2 week independent consumer trial of 30 people: Immediately:.-93% demonstrated an improvement in skin smoothness after immediate** use..-90% demonstrated an improvement in pore refining after immediate** use..100% demonstrated an improvement in skin moisturization immediately** after use..After one week:.- 100% demonstrated a reduction in excess oil after 1 week of use..**15 min post-application....CLEAN at Sephora is our commitment to offering formulas that go beyond regulatory standards to avoid controversial ingredients without sacrificing on effectiveness.
ingredients: -Japanese Wild Rose: Supports natural circulation, balances skin, and improves the look of pores..-Japanese Leopard Lily: Reduces oil production, calms problem skin, and supports natural turnover of the skin...-Tatcha's Signature Hadasei-3: Restores a healthy-looking, youthful radiance with nourishing green tea, rice, and algae...Water, Saccharomyces/Camellia Sinensis Leaf/Cladosiphon Okamuranus/Rice Ferment Filtrate*, Dimethicone, Propanediol, Glycerin, Diglycerin, Diphenylsiloxy Phenyl Trimethicone, Gold, Belamcanda Chinensis Root Extract, Rosa Multiflora Fruit Extract, Houttuynia Cordata Extract, Sophora Angustifolia Root Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Lecithin, Pistacia Lentiscus (Mastic) Gum, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Citrate, Mica, Peg-9 Polydimethylsiloxyethyl Dimethicone, Dimethicone/Peg-10/15 Crosspolymer, Dimethicone/Phenyl Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Disodium Edta, Tin Oxide, Titanium Dioxide, Butylene Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Parfum/Fragrance, Alcohol, Phenoxyethanol. *Hadasei-3......The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Scoop a pearl-size amount of cream with the gold spoon. .-Massage onto face, neck, and d√©colletage in upward strokes. .-Use daily, morning and night.

reviews.review_text: OH MY GOSH my skin is SO soft and so much clearer (I paired it with the teal cleanser also from tatcha) but my highlight is definitely this moisturizer. I have very acne prone and oily skin, but I swim, so I never used a moisturizer for fear that I would break out like crazy with the hydration plus my oily skin. This cream not only smoothed out my skin and made it SO soft, but it didn't add ANY oil and has such a lightweight feel. It doesn't add any sort of finish to my skin, like shiny, matte, etc, which I am grateful for because other moisturizers I have used in the past make my skin very oily. Long story short, best moisturizer I've ever tried.

It's SUPER light and spreads easily, it has a lovely fresh scent and it walks a fine line between keeping my oily skin hydrated and not making my skin feel like I'm wearing heavy lotion. Definitely recommend for my other oily gals, but I don't think it'll provide nearly enough hydration for normal / dry skin types.

reviews.review_text: This moisturizer is magic! reviews.review_title: A must have light cream for oily/acne prone skin!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Tatcha never fails!! I have oily/acne prone skin and sensitive skin that burns and turns red with certain products. This cream feels like a cold glass of water for the skin as others have said in their reviews! Its so light and soft and the smell is very mild and calming. It goes on the skin so gently and doesn't leave my face sticky or cause burning or redness. The cream dissolves into my skin instantly and feels light and invisible throughout the day. It goes well under makeup as it's not thick and does not make my face sticky or oily. I have hugeeee pores and this cream seriously shrunk them somehow after the first bottle I went through. The difference in my pore size was substantial so I ordered another bottle. It doesn't clog my pores and leave me with huge oil filled pores like some creams. An amazing light weight moisturizer for summer. If you are looking for an ultra hydrating thick cream for dry flaky skin for winter months I would not suggest this cream. If you have oily/ blemished skin and pores that clog easily or need something light and refreshing for summer months, this is the face cream for you.
